entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider making BlazorWebView Android 'fire and forget' disposal on by default #24250
    .NET 9 Planning
  • InAppBillingPlugin support for NET8 #24249
  • [iOS] SafeArea arrange insets are currently insetting based on an incorrect Bounds #24246
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Android: Error in migrating Android specific Resources (AndroidResource) from Xamarin Forms to MAUI Android (R.java error) #24245
  • Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #24243
    9.0-rc1
  • Application configuration is invalid (.NET MAUI/Windows) #24242
  • Maui Shell weird navigation issue with timing of ApplyQueryAttributes and Page Lifecycle #24241
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' on App Startup #24240
  • [iOS] Lifecycle for push notifications needs to be conditionally implemented #24237
    9.0-rc1
  • [NET9] iOS Run Templates on NET9 are failing #24236
    Backlog
  • Add a CanSwipe property to SwipeView #24235
  • Problem initializing WindowsForms.BlazorWebView -- The path is empty. (Parameter 'relativeTo') #24234
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Blue notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24232
    9.0-rc1
  • RefreshView IsEnabled not working (iOS/Android) #24228

Closed

  • Blazor + Web App template produces version mismatch warning #23946
  • [.NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 7] Blue Notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24239
  • MAUI - Android Navigationbar BarBackgroundColor is not updating as per the Theme color specified. #11790
    .NET 8 SR9
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing #23195
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage in NavigationPage #22899
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Testing] Re-enable/move TrackColorInitializesCorrectly/TrackColorUpdatesCorrectly to Appium #20535
    Backlog
  • [Windows] [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] App icon in the taskbar is pixelated #23212
    Backlog
  • Pre-filled Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #20196
  • [Android] Dynamically loading an assembly results in BadImageFormatException #24221
  • "No C# compiler has been specified" trying to compile iOS Bindings library #24210

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] cache `Join` and `Cap` enum values #24248
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [release/8.x] Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements #24247
    area-infrastructure
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to double in MVVM context (Windows) #24233
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
  • [X] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their non-compiled counterparts #24229
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨

Merged

  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [android] call `PlatformContentViewGroup.postInvalidate()` less #24222
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area-testing, area-controls-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • [ci] Use passwordless auth for darc/maestro #24220
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Add some defensive code around layout propagation #24217
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24115
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Control device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24197
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for CornerRadius of GradientDrawable for ImageButton #24200
    community ✨
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
